description: Retrieves partition statistics of columns. The Identity and Access Management (IAM) permission required for this operation is GetPartition.

parameters.name: DatabaseName
parameters.description: The name of the catalog database where the partitions reside.

parameters.name: TableName
parameters.description: The name of the partitions' table.

parameters.name: PartitionValues
parameters.description: A list of partition values identifying the partition. (string) ---

parameters.name: ColumnNames
parameters.description: A list of the column names. (string) ---

nested_items.name: ColumnStatisticsList
nested_items.description: List of ColumnStatistics that failed to be retrieved.

nested_items.name: ColumnName
nested_items.description: Name of column which statistics belong to.

nested_items.name: ColumnType
nested_items.description: The data type of the column.

nested_items.name: AnalyzedTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when column statistics were generated.

nested_items.name: StatisticsData
nested_items.description: A ColumnStatisticData object that contains the statistics data values.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of column statistics data.

nested_items.name: BooleanColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Boolean column statistics data.

nested_items.name: NumberOfTrues
nested_items.description: The number of true values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfFalses
nested_items.description: The number of false values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: DateColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Date column statistics data.

nested_items.name: MinimumValue
nested_items.description: The lowest value in the column.

nested_items.name: MaximumValue
nested_items.description: The highest value in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDistinctValues
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in a column.

nested_items.name: DecimalColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Decimal column statistics data. UnscaledValues within are Base64-encoded binary objects storing big-endian, two's complement representations of the decimal's unscaled value.

nested_items.name: MinimumValue
nested_items.description: The lowest value in the column.

nested_items.name: UnscaledValue
nested_items.description: The unscaled numeric value.

nested_items.name: Scale
nested_items.description: The scale that determines where the decimal point falls in the unscaled value.

nested_items.name: MaximumValue
nested_items.description: The highest value in the column.

nested_items.name: UnscaledValue
nested_items.description: The unscaled numeric value.

nested_items.name: Scale
nested_items.description: The scale that determines where the decimal point falls in the unscaled value.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDistinctValues
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in a column.

nested_items.name: DoubleColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Double column statistics data.

nested_items.name: MinimumValue
nested_items.description: The lowest value in the column.

nested_items.name: MaximumValue
nested_items.description: The highest value in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDistinctValues
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in a column.

nested_items.name: LongColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Long column statistics data.

nested_items.name: MinimumValue
nested_items.description: The lowest value in the column.

nested_items.name: MaximumValue
nested_items.description: The highest value in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDistinctValues
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in a column.

nested_items.name: StringColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: String column statistics data.

nested_items.name: MaximumLength
nested_items.description: The size of the longest string in the column.

nested_items.name: AverageLength
nested_items.description: The average string length in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfDistinctValues
nested_items.description: The number of distinct values in a column.

nested_items.name: BinaryColumnStatisticsData
nested_items.description: Binary column statistics data.

nested_items.name: MaximumLength
nested_items.description: The size of the longest bit sequence in the column.

nested_items.name: AverageLength
nested_items.description: The average bit sequence length in the column.

nested_items.name: NumberOfNulls
nested_items.description: The number of null values in the column.

nested_items.name: Errors
nested_items.description: Error occurred during retrieving column statistics data.

nested_items.name: ColumnName
nested_items.description: The name of the column that failed.

nested_items.name: ErrorCode
nested_items.description: The code associated with this error.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message describing the error.
